segment.source: Cortana integration in your business or enterprise (Windows 10)
segment.target: Cortana integration in your business or enterprise (Windows 10)

segment.source: The world’s first personal digital assistant helps users get things done, even at work.
segment.target: The world’s first personal digital assistant helps users get things done, even at work.

segment.source: Cortana includes powerful configuration options specifically to optimize for unique small to medium-sized business and enterprise environments.
segment.target: Cortana includes powerful configuration options specifically to optimize for unique small to medium-sized business and enterprise environments.

segment.source: Cortana integration in your business or enterprise
segment.target: Cortana integration in your business or enterprise

segment.source: Applies to:
segment.target: Applies to:

segment.source: Windows 10
segment.target: Windows 10

segment.source: Windows 10 Mobile
segment.target: Windows 10 Mobile

segment.source: The world’s first personal digital assistant helps users get things done, even at work.
segment.target: The world’s first personal digital assistant helps users get things done, even at work.

segment.source: Cortana includes powerful configuration options specifically to optimize for unique small to medium-sized business and enterprise environments.
segment.target: Cortana includes powerful configuration options specifically to optimize for unique small to medium-sized business and enterprise environments.

segment.source: Cortana integration with Office 365
segment.target: Cortana integration with Office 365

segment.source: Cortana in Windows 10 is already great at letting your employees quickly see what the day is going to look like, see where and when their meetings are going to be, get a sense of travel times to and from work, and even get updates from a calendar for upcoming trips.
segment.target: Cortana in Windows 10 is already great at letting your employees quickly see what the day is going to look like, see where and when their meetings are going to be, get a sense of travel times to and from work, and even get updates from a calendar for upcoming trips.

segment.source: But Cortana works even harder when she connects to Office 365, helping employees prepare for meetings, learn about co-workers, and receive reminders about where they need to be so they won’t be late.
segment.target: But Cortana works even harder when she connects to Office 365, helping employees prepare for meetings, learn about co-workers, and receive reminders about where they need to be so they won’t be late.

segment.source: More info:
segment.target: More info:

segment.source: For specific info about what you need to know as a company administrator, including how to turn off Cortana with Office 365, see the Cortana integration with Office 365 support topic.
segment.target: For specific info about what you need to know as a company administrator, including how to turn off Cortana with Office 365, see the Cortana integration with Office 365 support topic.

segment.source: For a quick review of the frequently asked questions about Cortana and Office 365 integration, see the blog post, An early look at Cortana integration with Office 365.
segment.target: For a quick review of the frequently asked questions about Cortana and Office 365 integration, see the blog post, An early look at Cortana integration with Office 365.

segment.source: Cortana and Power BI
segment.target: Cortana and Power BI

segment.source: Integration between Cortana and Power BI shows how Cortana can work with custom business analytics solutions to enable you to get answers directly from your key business data, including introducing new features that let you create custom Cortana answers using the full capabilities of Power BI Desktop.
segment.target: Integration between Cortana and Power BI shows how Cortana can work with custom business analytics solutions to enable you to get answers directly from your key business data, including introducing new features that let you create custom Cortana answers using the full capabilities of Power BI Desktop.

segment.source: More info:
segment.target: More info:

segment.source: For specific info about how to start using Power BI and Cortana integration, how to customize your data results, and how to use the “Hey Cortana” functionality, see the Power BI: Announcing Power BI integration with Cortana and new ways to quickly find insights in your data blog.
segment.target: For specific info about how to start using Power BI and Cortana integration, how to customize your data results, and how to use the “Hey Cortana” functionality, see the Power BI: Announcing Power BI integration with Cortana and new ways to quickly find insights in your data blog.

segment.source: Cortana and Microsoft Dynamics CRM
segment.target: Cortana and Microsoft Dynamics CRM

segment.source: Cortana integration is a Preview feature that's available for your test or dev environment, starting with the CRM Online 2016 Update.
segment.target: Cortana integration is a Preview feature that's available for your test or dev environment, starting with the CRM Online 2016 Update.

segment.source: If you decide to use this Preview feature, you'll need to turn in on and accept the license terms.
segment.target: If you decide to use this Preview feature, you'll need to turn in on and accept the license terms.

segment.source: After that, salespeople will get proactive insights from Cortana on important CRM activities, including sales leads, accounts, and opportunities; presenting the most relevant info at any given time.
segment.target: After that, salespeople will get proactive insights from Cortana on important CRM activities, including sales leads, accounts, and opportunities; presenting the most relevant info at any given time.

segment.source: More info:
segment.target: More info:

segment.source: For more info about Preview features, see What are Preview features and how do I enable them?.
segment.target: For more info about Preview features, see What are Preview features and how do I enable them?.

segment.source: For more info about Cortana, see What is Cortana?.
segment.target: For more info about Cortana, see What is Cortana?.

segment.source: For more info about CRM integration, how to turn on Cortana, and how to provide feedback, see Preview feature: Set up Cortana integration.
segment.target: For more info about CRM integration, how to turn on Cortana, and how to provide feedback, see Preview feature: Set up Cortana integration.

segment.source: Cortana and privacy
segment.target: Cortana and privacy

segment.source: We understand that there are concerns about Cortana and enterprise privacy, so we’ve put together the Cortana, Search, and privacy: FAQ topic that covers many of the frequently asked questions.
segment.target: We understand that there are concerns about Cortana and enterprise privacy, so we’ve put together the Cortana, Search, and privacy: FAQ topic that covers many of the frequently asked questions.

segment.source: These questions include things such as what info is collected by Cortana, where the info is saved, how to manage what data is collected, how to turn Cortana off, how to opt completely out of data collection, and what info is shared with other Microsoft apps and services.
segment.target: These questions include things such as what info is collected by Cortana, where the info is saved, how to manage what data is collected, how to turn Cortana off, how to opt completely out of data collection, and what info is shared with other Microsoft apps and services.

segment.source: Set up Cortana using Group Policy and MDM policies
segment.target: Set up Cortana using Group Policy and MDM policies

segment.source: Set up and manage Cortana by using the following Group Policy and mobile device management (MDM) policies.
segment.target: Set up and manage Cortana by using the following Group Policy and mobile device management (MDM) policies.

segment.source: Group policy
segment.target: Group policy

segment.source: MDM policy
segment.target: MDM policy

segment.source: Description
segment.target: Description

segment.source: Computer Configuration\Administrative Templates\Windows Components\Search\Allow Cortana
segment.target: Computer Configuration\Administrative Templates\Windows Components\Search\Allow Cortana

segment.source: Experience/AllowCortana
segment.target: Experience/AllowCortana

segment.source: Specifies whether employees can use Cortana.
segment.target: Specifies whether employees can use Cortana.

segment.source: Note
segment.target: Note

segment.source: Employees can still perform searches even with Cortana turned off.
segment.target: Employees can still perform searches even with Cortana turned off.

segment.source: Computer Configuration\Administrative Templates\Control Panel\Regional and Language Options\Allow input personalization
segment.target: Computer Configuration\Administrative Templates\Control Panel\Regional and Language Options\Allow input personalization

segment.source: Privacy/AllowInput Personalization
segment.target: Privacy/AllowInput Personalization

segment.source: Specifies whether to turn on automatic learning, which allows the collection of speech and handwriting patterns, typing history, contacts, and recent calendar information.
segment.target: Specifies whether to turn on automatic learning, which allows the collection of speech and handwriting patterns, typing history, contacts, and recent calendar information.

segment.source: It is required for the use of Cortana.
segment.target: It is required for the use of Cortana.

segment.source: Important
segment.target: Important

segment.source: Cortana won’t work if this setting is turned off (disabled).
segment.target: Cortana won’t work if this setting is turned off (disabled).

segment.source: None
segment.target: None

segment.source: System/AllowLocation
segment.target: System/AllowLocation

segment.source: Specifies whether to allow app access to the Location service.
segment.target: Specifies whether to allow app access to the Location service.

segment.source: Computer Configuration\Administrative Templates\Windows Components\Search\Don't search the web or display web results
segment.target: Computer Configuration\Administrative Templates\Windows Components\Search\Don't search the web or display web results

segment.source: None
segment.target: None

segment.source: Specifies whether search can perform queries on the web and if the web results are displayed in search.
segment.target: Specifies whether search can perform queries on the web and if the web results are displayed in search.

segment.source: Important
segment.target: Important

segment.source: Cortana won’t work if this setting is turned off (disabled).
segment.target: Cortana won’t work if this setting is turned off (disabled).

segment.source: Computer Configuration\Administrative Templates\Windows Components\Search\Allow search and Cortana to use location
segment.target: Computer Configuration\Administrative Templates\Windows Components\Search\Allow search and Cortana to use location

segment.source: Search/AllowSearchToUse Location
segment.target: Search/AllowSearchToUse Location

segment.source: Specifies whether search and Cortana can provide location aware search and Cortana results.
segment.target: Specifies whether search and Cortana can provide location aware search and Cortana results.

segment.source: Important
segment.target: Important

segment.source: Cortana won’t work if this setting is turned off (disabled).
segment.target: Cortana won’t work if this setting is turned off (disabled).

segment.source: Computer Configuration\Administrative Templates\Windows Components\Search\Set the SafeSearch setting for Search
segment.target: Computer Configuration\Administrative Templates\Windows Components\Search\Set the SafeSearch setting for Search

segment.source: Search/SafeSearch Permissions
segment.target: Search/SafeSearch Permissions

segment.source: Specifies what level of safe search (filtering adult content) is required.
segment.target: Specifies what level of safe search (filtering adult content) is required.

segment.source: Note
segment.target: Note

segment.source: This setting only applies to Windows 10 Mobile.
segment.target: This setting only applies to Windows 10 Mobile.

segment.source: User Configuration\Administrative Templates\Windows Components\File Explorer\Turn off display of recent search entries in the File Explorer search box
segment.target: User Configuration\Administrative Templates\Windows Components\File Explorer\Turn off display of recent search entries in the File Explorer search box

segment.source: None
segment.target: None

segment.source: Specifies whether the search box can suggest recent queries and prevent entries from being stored in the registry for future reference.
segment.target: Specifies whether the search box can suggest recent queries and prevent entries from being stored in the registry for future reference.

segment.source: Important
segment.target: Important

segment.source: Cortana won’t work if this setting is turned off (disabled).
segment.target: Cortana won’t work if this setting is turned off (disabled).

segment.source: User Configuration\Administrative Templates\Start Menu and Taskbar\Do not search communications
segment.target: User Configuration\Administrative Templates\Start Menu and Taskbar\Do not search communications

segment.source: None
segment.target: None

segment.source: Specifies whether the Start menu search box searches communications.
segment.target: Specifies whether the Start menu search box searches communications.

segment.source: Important
segment.target: Important

segment.source: Cortana won’t work if this setting is turned off (disabled).
segment.target: Cortana won’t work if this setting is turned off (disabled).

segment.target: More info:

segment.target: For specific info about how to set, manage, and use each of these MDM policies to configure Cortana in your enterprise, see the Policy CSP topic, located in the configuration service provider reference topics.

segment.target: For specific info about how to set, manage, and use each of these Group Policies to configure Cortana in your enterprise, see the Group Policy TechCenter.
